function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Imbalanced air distribution due to the positioning of fans and air-conditioners leading to stagnant air pockets.","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission due to poor air circulation.","Mitigation":"Regular airflow testing and adjustment of fan and air-conditioner positions to ensure even air distribution.","Technologies":"Airflow simulation software, automated airflow monitoring systems.","People":"Occupants of the building, particularly those in close proximity to stagnant air pockets.","Owner":"Facility management team, HVAC technicians."}]}
